Text:
Woah! please support the guys and buy this after you "try before you buy" it :-P

Cheers
@Cyph3r19 Genius... it's been 14 years... who do you think gets the money? Hahaha clueless.
Thanks alot for this Wanderer!  Could you also possibly upload Neverwinter Nights 2 and Icewind Dale 1 and 2 from GoG?
Ignore xhizors' edginess, if you have the $10 to spare, throw a little something on the communion tray. We must vote with our dollars for games like this, regardless of how old they are.

You do realize that the original companies still own the rights to these games and GOG has to buy the rights to sell them, right? If anything THIS is the market you should support after you've tried the games because these games are awesome. GOG ges people great content at reasonable prices. Nothing wrong with supporting them (and DRM free games) and the creators who still make commissions off a lot of the titles.
